posts.post_title: Centered T206 Joss Portrait, SGC 4 - Piedmont 150/25

posts.post_content:
Reduced - $800 OBO. I need to move it. 

Similar copies have sold $900 and above since 2023; VCP on this in a SGC 4 is $1700 or close right now due to an auction house copy going for way over estimates. Anyhow you would be hard pressed to find a nicer 4.

Sweet card, John.  Surprised this is still available....
